summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Eastlake Avenue, from Roy Street to the north line of Almy Street; Roy Street, from Eastlake Avenue to Pontius Avenue; Howard Avenue North, from Roy Street to Almy Street; Valley Street, from Howard Avenue North to Eastlake Avenue; Ward Street, from Howard Avenue North to Eastlake Avenue; Almy Street, from Howard Avenue North to Eastlake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same in accordance with Resolution of the City Council of the City of Seattle, No. 818, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
